name: New Ancient Adventures
description:
Explore Ancient Ruins to find a secret of epic proportions.

My Retro Puzzle platformer for ludum dare 36

music by Philippe Groarke

https://socapex.wordpress.com/music/

controls

movement

arrows left or right.
down arrow for trespassing thin platforms

space for jump

Silence music . s key

alt right for activating levers.

on web version alt disrupts the browser so it's recommended playing on full screen or pressing f11 so the browser plays the tab on full screen and doesn't act up .

Changelog.

added narrative elements.

sound

freeze bugs.

Upcoming.

soundeffects
